data.actual_result: It is show and is interactive
data.short_description: If you use the emoji picker and click on an emoji from another server when you don't have nitro, you can still see the selection tab and can interact with it
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a random server when you don't have Nitro - Open the emoji picker and click on an emoji from another server - Notice that the selection bar is still there - Click near the bottom of where the other buttons are - Notice that the selection moves
